response.message: I think the Area51 definition phase of a site now looks more like an "alpha" release of the site. It might be good. I also see that some people tend to try to answer example questions using the comments. This is not so good.

On the topic of making SO a more Social - how about creating Facebook and/or Google+ app that would insert your (SO user) feed of questions/answers into your Google/Facebook feed.

Another idea would be to allow embedding your questions/answers as snippets just like Github's Gists in your blog post.
